column4: when i use fwbuilder to create a firewall in Lucid Lynx, it crashes when i try to save what i made. so i never get a .fwb file saved, let alone compile and install the firewall script since it's crashing. anyone have any idea? or use fwbuilder and is having the same issue so i know i'm not alone? ;-)
I'm not too familiar with fwbuilder, but ubuntu comes with a firewall app already called ufw for "uncomplicated firewall".  There's also a simple gui front-end available called gufw
roger. i might go ahead and use that for now. but fwbuilder is awesome :)
